title: Family Activity Feed - Real-time updates
description: Real-time family updates when members add photos/stories. Comments and reactions. Push notifications. Creates FOMO for non-users. Requires Supabase Realtime or similar.
notes: Partial implementation: activity feed triggers migration, components updated. Needs review.

title: Photo Magic Suite - AI colorization and animation
description: AI-powered photo enhancement: colorization, Deep Nostalgia-style animation, restoration. Extremely viral. Integrate with Replicate or similar ML APIs.
notes: Partial implementation: photo colorization API, migration created. Needs review.
close_reason: Completed: Demo mode + Replicate API integration, ColorizeButton, BeforeAfter view, PhotoMagicDialog

title: Shareable Highlight Cards - Viral growth engine
description: Instagram-ready cards for birthdays, anniversaries, on-this-day moments. One-click sharing to social media. Branded with app watermark for viral acquisition. Use Satori/Canvas for image generation. Quick win - 2 weeks.
close_reason: Implemented: 5 card templates, 5 themes, 3 sizes, Web Share API, PNG download, ThisDay integration

title: Add family broadcast time capsules
description: When recipient_profile_id is NULL, the capsule is meant for 'my family'. Implement: 1) On delivery, fan-out to all family circle members, 2) Create notifications for each family member, 3) Show in everyone's 'received' tab. Consider privacy implications and opt-out settings.

title: Relationship Path Visualization
description: Interactive 'How are we related?' feature. Visual path with animated highlighting. Shows relationship degree (2nd cousin once removed). Export to PDF/PNG. Use D3.js or similar.

title: Magic Link Access - Zero-friction authentication
description: Remove login friction entirely. Email/SMS magic links, no passwords, instant access for tech-averse family members. Quick win - 1 week effort. Use Supabase magic link or custom JWT tokens.
notes: Partial implementation: magic-link page created, auth callback updated. Needs review.

title: Historical Context Timeline
description: Overlay world events on ancestor lifetimes. 'Your grandfather was 25 when WWII started.' Interactive zoom/filter. Educational connection to history. Requires historical events database.

title: Generate Supabase types for time_capsules table
description: Run supabase gen types to include the new time_capsules table in generated TypeScript types. This will remove the need for 'any' type casts in API routes.

title: Add email notifications for time capsule delivery
description: Send email notification when a time capsule is delivered. Include: sender name, capsule title, link to view. Respect user email preferences. Add new preference toggle for time_capsule_notifications.

title: AI Ancestor Biographies
description: Auto-generate Wikipedia-style life stories from tree data. Transform dates, locations, facts into readable narratives. Highlight gaps to encourage data entry. Shareable biography cards.

title: Smart Engagement System - Nudges and digests
description: Profile completeness ring, birthday/anniversary nudges, weekly family digest email, discovery prompts for incomplete profiles. Backbone of retention.

title: Profile Completeness Progress Ring
description: Visual progress indicator on each profile. Basic info 20%, Photo 20%, Story 20%, Relationships 20%, Location 20%. Creates natural gamification. Quick win - 3 days.
close_reason: Implemented: SVG progress ring, 5 categories, color gradient, tooltip, animation, bilingual support

title: Birthday/Anniversary Notification Cron
description: Automated cron job for birthday/anniversary nudges. Push notifications and email. Quick win - 1 week.
notes: Partial implementation: cron endpoints created. Needs review.

title: Weekly Family Digest Email
description: Weekly email digest: upcoming birthdays, new stories, on-this-day memories. Newsletter-style engagement.
close_reason: Implemented: HTML email templates, content queries, cron endpoint, unsubscribe flow, settings integration

title: Competitor Research: Family Tree Apps
description: Research 3 competitor family tree/social network apps. Register, explore features, take screenshots, document functionality, pricing, and monetization strategies. Create comprehensive analysis for Gene-Tree product development.

title: Research Gamification System
description: Achievements, streaks, challenges. 'Archivist' badge for 100 photos. Research streaks. Family challenges. Optional leaderboards. Power user retention.

title: Duplicate Person Detection
description: Smart merge suggestions. Detect when same person added twice. Confidence scores. Handle edge cases. Data quality foundation.

title: Memory Book PDF Generator
description: Compile family stories into printable PDF. Beautiful book layout. Select stories, photos, people. Print-on-demand partnership. Monetization opportunity.

title: Cousin/Relative Finder
description: Algorithmic matching without DNA. Find users who share ancestors. Privacy-conscious connection requests. 'You share great-great-grandmother Sarah.' Network growth mechanism.

title: Family Milestone Tracker
description: Track milestones for living family (first steps, graduations). Photo/video attachments. Anniversary reminders. Appeals to young parents - key demographic for growth.

title: Story Capture Engine - Weekly prompts, voice recording, email reply
description: Critical feature: Weekly story prompts via email/SMS, voice recording with transcription, elder-friendly email reply interface. Identified by 4/5 research agents as the killer feature. Includes: prompt library, Twilio/Whisper integration, email parsing.

title: Voice Recording with Whisper Transcription
description: Native voice recording in profile view. 2-minute stories. Whisper API transcription. Store as MP3 + text. Elder-friendly.
notes: Partial implementation: voice components, transcribe API created. Needs review.

title: Story Prompt Library - 52+ questions
description: Database of categorized prompts: Childhood, Career, Family Traditions, Relationships. Rotate weekly. Track answered prompts.
close_reason: Implemented: 60 prompts across 8 categories, weekly rotation API, user history tracking, WeeklyPrompt component

title: Email Reply Parser for Stories
description: Parse email replies as story submissions. Elder just replies to email, story gets saved. Requires email webhook integration.

title: Add Time Capsules dashboard widget
description: Create a dashboard widget showing: 1) Count of pending capsules you've sent, 2) Any newly delivered capsules to you (unread), 3) Quick link to /time-capsules. Similar to the notifications widget style.

title: Implement 'after passing' time capsule delivery trigger
description: When a profile is marked as deceased (death_date set), check for pending time capsules with delivery_trigger='after_passing' and deliver them. Requires: 1) Add trigger/webhook on user_profiles death_date update, 2) Query time_capsules where created_by=deceased_id AND delivery_trigger='after_passing' AND delivery_status='scheduled', 3) Deliver all matching capsules.

title: Animated Migration Maps
description: Visual family journey across geography. Animated paths showing movement across generations. 'Your family's journey from Ireland to New York.' Shareable video export. Use Mapbox.
